message: To change the view’s output columns safely, I will DROP and recreate `public.component_parameters_full` after adding/backfilling new columns, then drop legacy fields. This may clear prior GRANTs; adding a NOTE in SQL. If strict grant preservation is required, a follow-up migration can capture/reapply privileges.

ordering: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW new shape
fallbacks: Down migration restores legacy columns and view shape
